British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please accept our apologies. There were 2 incorrect dates given for the first term events.
Below are correct dates for your information.
16th October 2012 Cello and Piano recital by Beecher Acoustics.
24th October 2012 International Day. Students are to come dressed in their national costume or an adopted costume. Parents are invited to the International Day assembly.
5th November 2012 Remembrance Day assembly.
26th November 2012 Deepavali Celebration. Students are to come dressed in traditional Indian costume. Parents are invited to the Deepavali assembly.
6th December 2012 Foundation Christmas concert. Foundation parents are invited.
10th December 2012 Primary Christmas concert. Parents will be invited to purchase tickets for the concert.
12th December 2012 Middle School Christmas Carols and Bazaar. Parents are invited.
Kind Regards,
Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
